nodes.text: The Mirrin sector was a sector in New Republic space.
It was home to the Mirrin system, a star system contained both Suraz 4 and Suraz 5, as well as the Republic base for the sector on Mirrin Prime.
It was the location of a First Order attack on the Yissira Zyde, upon which Rapier Squadron, led by Poe Dameron, intervened.
